channel.title: [Want to play World Of Warcraft for free?] TUT
channel.description:
This is a newb tut, since im doing it off my head. I did a search and didn't find anything else on this so here we go.
[You will need a working world of warcraft client]
1. Go to wowstatus.net and find/pick a server you wish to play on 2. Look next to the name and it will have a version # 1.9.4, 1.9.0 etc.. 3. Click on the link with the name 4. It will have IE. Gameversion 1.9.4 Homepage Mywowserver.com Account signup blahblah.com <----- You want to click on that server adress blahblah.com xp High Location USA
5. Once you have clicked the signup page, Fill in your username/password you want and somtimes you'll have to put your e-mail there. 6. Go to there main site, register and download the servers required addons
[ You will mostly never find a server with out its own custom addons ]

item.title: [Want to play World Of Warcraft for free?] TUT
item.dc:creator: @d3ltr33 d3ltr33
item.description:
@d3ltr33 wrote:

I’m gonna think of this as a demo which blizzind should have released for me to play before wasting a butt load of money on a game i might not play.

Read full topic

item.title: [Want to play World Of Warcraft for free?] TUT
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

jag024:

Yea, but you wont get in trouble for Runescape private servers if you are ONLY PLAYING IT NOT RUNNIGN IT.

In WoW you have to modify some files to play on a private server, and that’s not allowed. You’re also playing their game for free.

Read full topic

item.description:
@jme wrote:

I’ve played on a few of these a little while ago, there pretty pointless considering there is not a heck of a lot do do, and there doesnt seem to be a half decent server(you get logged out a lot). Also I did enjoy just roaming the land to get some ideas

item.title: [Want to play World Of Warcraft for free?] TUT
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

This is a newb tut, since im doing it off my head. I did a search and didn’t find anything else on this so here we go.

[You will need a working world of warcraft client]

  1. Go to wowstatus.net and find/pick a server you wish to play on

  2. Look next to the name and it will have a version # 1.9.4, 1.9.0 etc…

  3. Click on the link with the name

  4. It will have
    IE.
    Gameversion 1.9.4
    Homepage Mywowserver.com
    Account signup blahblah.com <----- You want to click on that
    server adress blahblah.com
    xp High
    Location USA

  5. Once you have clicked the signup page, Fill in your username/password you want and somtimes you’ll have to put your e-mail there.

  6. Go to there main site, register and download the servers required addons

[ You will mostly never find a server with out its own custom addons ]

Read full topic
